Head injury?
Value: He fell out of his crib when he was an infant. He was robbed while working at a gas station and was hit in the head with the butt end of the shotgun.

Heading: Physically abused?
Value: Yes, his mother beat him with a belt as a child

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Groundskeeper, volunteer firemen, gas station, electronic, tech

Heading: Spend time in prison?
Value: Yes – 3-5 years in state prison for Arson

Value: Not that we know of for sure, but it is suspected
